name: Stella Polyhedron
summary: Learn about .STEL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Stella suite, which consists of Small Stella, Great Stella, and Stella4D, allows you to view and create 3D polyhedra. Stella users can save a polyhedron as a STEL file by selecting File → Save as....

Each STEL file contains all the data Stella needs to show the polyhedron it describes to a user. This includes a record of the model, the model's current stellation, the model's facets, whether the model is spinning, morphing, or folding, and the user's current screen layout and views.

description: A STEL file is a 3D polyhedron created by one of Robert Webb's Stella programs. Stella users can open a STEL file to view and edit the polyhedron it contains. They can also use the STEL file to print a corresponding polyhedron net (foldable paper model).

instructions: You can open a STEL file in Small Stella, Great Stella, or Stella4D (Windows). To do so, select File → Open. Then, navigate to and open your STEL file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .stel file in Robert Webb Great Stella
images.caption: STEL file open in Robert Webb Great Stella
